sentences.en: As I drove to her house, I actually had a case of predate jitters!
sentences.cn: 我开车驶往母亲住所, 竟感到约会前的紧张不安.

sentences.en: Cooling towers predate the nuclear age; a fact that may surprise many.
sentences.cn: 冷却塔早在核时代到来以前就出现了, 这个事实也许让人感到吃惊.
他的麻烦早在经济衰退前就出现了。

sentences.en: Indeed, this strand may well predate the anti - pollution effort.
sentences.cn: 而且, 这一目标或许要早于防止污染.

sentences.en: The kingdom predates other African cultures by over 3,000 years.
sentences.cn: 这个王国比其他非洲文明早3,000年以上。

sentences.en: The origins of this theory actually predate widespread interest in 2012.
sentences.cn: 这个理论的起源早在2012年前,就广泛的传播了.
这些哺乳动物出现的年代早于某些卵生动物.

trans.tran_en: If you say that one thing predated another, you mean that the first thing happened or existed some time before the second thing
